name: OutBreak (itch) (anggakus76)
description:
A Top-Down Shooter Game with post-apocalyptic zombie themes, you play as Retail Worker Survivor and must reach the hospital to get evacuated. Player must deal with a zombie hordes with many characteristics

Credits:
Game Designer, Project Manager - Angga Kusuma
Programmer - Bagus Darmawan
Moch Idhar Wafi - 3D Artist
Nikola Ziljian - UI Artist
Al Firda - 2D Artist
